categories: Category:Battles of the Early rebellion against the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Defense of the southern polar regions

The defense of the southern polar regions was tasked to Admiral Raddus by King Lee-Char during the Galactic Empire's invasion of the planet Mon Cala. The defense ended when the Empire began to bombard the region and Raddus gave orders to a commader to launch all cruisers so they could escape the blockade of the planet.
